sens.vi: she hates her job, she hates her friends, and she hates her life!
sens.syn: abhor, abominate, despise, detest, execrate, loathe
sens.rel: deplore, deprecate, disapprove (of), discountenance, disdain, disfavor, scorn
sens.near: desire, fancy, favor, like, prefer; enjoy, relish; admire, adore, approve (of), esteem, hallow, idolize, revere, venerate, worship; cherish, prize, treasure
